name: Beastly shopping
description:
Sometimes it’s not the human that has to hide a monster in their closet, sometimes it’s the monster that has to hide the human! 

When an unfortunate young wizard botches an incantation, he accidentally gets transported into a world full of hungry and scary monsters. Luckily for him, the one beast the he got to turned out quite friendly… Now there’s just one question: how long will they be able to cover up the human’s existence? And is it even possible for the wizard to get back home? 

Controls: 

Use WASD to move around, E to collect items and click to continue the story
